name: Outdoor Research CarryOut Dry Pack - Unisex
description: The weather doesn't always cooperate with your commutes or travels. Part dry sack, part backpack, the CarryOut keeps your gear dry from point A to point B. Air-mesh shoulder straps and a removable webbing waistbelt hold the pack securely and comfortably when biking, hiking, or sitting on a train.Lightweight ripstop nylon with a waterproof TPU lamination.Fully seam-sealed to ensure water doesn't sneak in.Roll-top closure compresses to the size of contents.2 daisy chains and a front zippered pocket.
